original_text: He took Elijah's coat and he hit the water with it. He said, ‘Now is the Lord, Elijah's God, with me?’ When he hit the water with Elijah's coat, the water became separate, to the left side and to the right side. Elisha went across the river.
korean_text: 엘리야의 몸에서 떨어진 그의 겉옷을 가지고 물을 치며 이르되 엘리야의 하나님 여호와는 어디 계시니이까 하고 그도 물을 치매 물이 이리 저리 갈라지고 엘리사가 건너니라

sentences.original_text: and he hit the water with it
Now is the Lord, Elijah's God, with me
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 주님, 엘리야의 하나님이 나와 함께 계신가

sentences.original_text: When he hit the water with Elijah's coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 엘리야의 겉옷으로 물을 쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: to the left side and to the right side
